Pre-Game Insights: India vs Australia, Group B will be played on Saturday
Sunil Chhetri will lead the Indian Football Team
India is placed in a tough group but are anticipated to perform well
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game, which will take place at the Ahmed bin Ali Stadium, is expected to be a close one as both teams want to establish an early lead in Group B
Others: India has advanced to the third round of FIFA World Cup qualifiers for the first time after securing a noteworthy victory on the road against Kuwait in Group Aâ€”India's first in 22 years
The Blue Tigers have an upcoming match against Afghanistan in March and Kuwait and Qatar in June which will greatly influence their destiny in the qualifiers
For India to achieve history and go to the next round of the World Cup qualifying campaign, the forthcoming matches will be crucial
Sunil Chhetri will be the oldest player in the tournament to take on the field in the AFC Asian Cup 2024
He boasts an impressive record of 93 goals in 145 international matches for the Indian national football team so far and will try to make the most out of this tournament with the squad
India's performance in the AFC Asian Cup has the ability to significantly change and improve the dynamics of football in the nation
